name: Mars Escape
description:
Houdini Game Jam

Length: 1 week.

Theme: Don't panic.

Houdini was used to generate all of the terrain.

Premise

You have 10 minutes to drive your rover to a rocket to escape Mars before aliens attack.

Controls

WASD on the keyboard.

OR

Left stick and Left/Right trigger on a controller.

Credits

Art and coding - Bobby Hiom

Car scripting and Music - Never Rest Studio https://neverreststudio.itch.io/

Car scripting - Robin Turner https://rbnturner.itch.io/sentinel
